name: Terminal Hacker (itch) (untmdsprt)
description:
This is my first attempt at making a game with Unity. You select from three menu items to "hack" into a particular company. Passwords will be scrambled in which you have to unscramble to unlock the prize.

I would appreciate any feedback on the game. Please don't give just a "It sucks!" without going into detail as to why.

Thanks!
